elements.input: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md !border border-input hover:!border hover:!border-input/80 focus:!border-input/80 bg-background text-foreground px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50
elements.formFieldLabel: text-sm font-medium text-foreground leading-none peer-disabled:cursor-not-allowed peer-disabled:opacity-70
elements.formButtonReset: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/70 dark:hover:bg-secondary/80 inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50
elements.userButtonPopoverActionButton: bg-background text-foreground hover:text-foreground/85 relative before:absolute before:top-0 before:w-full before:border-muted before:border-t
elements.formButtonPrimary: !shadow-none bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50
elements.formFieldInputShowPasswordButton: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground inline-flex items-center justify-center whitespace-nowrap rounded-md text-sm font-medium ring-offset-background transition-colors focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:pointer-events-none disabled:opacity-50
